<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Reactive Shield](/Feats.aspx?ID=360) <actions string="Reaction" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Fighter" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=71" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 145 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Viking](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=81) (Level 4)

**Trigger**
An enemy hits you with a melee Strike.

**Requirements**
You are wielding a shield.

</column>

---

You can snap your shield into place just as you would take a blow, avoiding the hit at the last second. You immediately use the [Raise a Shield](/Actions.aspx?ID=98) action and gain your shield's bonus to AC. The circumstance bonus from the shield applies to your AC when you're determining the outcome of the triggering attack.
name: Reactive Shield
